display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                        
[media]
# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

[media]
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

[media]
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

[media]
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

[media]
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.

# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982499_874210870844905_8266732701765703080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=L4pcOuaFQ_cQ7kNvwEJDNdT&_nc_oc=Adm5fR-IcBeIgii7RjWW-1f7QRaqGZJZ3HxFJgOvOibcK-rw9sE-BJ8HsT0LFrXmk9g&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3UnvVH8lV_xZ_jODNsPWFQ&oh=00_Afo_6HOJDtst1rCCEdRyjggdPpuCIEWfgyiPqJTzp_lcvw&oe=696C04C9)
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982581_1223888319033072_3959488854512735737_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=K-3w0srCRmIQ7kNvwHmWr8i&_nc_oc=AdkP_lUlePj47xhjlBx42LI_bVv4JaX6JG7GThDLCw5mhmV-XG0Vr2lU1HHtkPad8fE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3UnvVH8lV_xZ_jODNsPWFQ&oh=00_AfoDFw1ej4fh3PGbpgusIOY29KHBzHWsggjLgykoG_uhUg&oe=696C121D)
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974548_1040387177540093_112250259871580574_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Bjmj98hq8jAQ7kNvwHRlyxB&_nc_oc=AdldKbfVza9CuIPJPO6j6DdaGbVtv_OtTdu4CjesBRmD2H9jl5Zhf3PXrhLN7N2IF1U&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3UnvVH8lV_xZ_jODNsPWFQ&oh=00_AfrMBZHKVY5JeOeVqbWB3lQIuMd_bAVpy8WNfv4qTJ-xsw&oe=696BFFD2)
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974628_1432121104166417_7819473213702105902_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=jQ5sdcTF7M4Q7kNvwFEl0Jg&_nc_oc=AdnajMJoTXO_SG8CzwbgQbkgMyGGfWx0W8YfIqCcE01EEJXRyGZDHDWxN8fKZEVsBTs&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3UnvVH8lV_xZ_jODNsPWFQ&oh=00_AfoCD41TpueBvvCQiAuEc-Hg8QPJU_jVu4839cTWmkqdzg&oe=696C1A02)
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.
